headline: Stock Market Sell-Off: 3 Growth Stocks That Are Absurdly Cheap
summary: Three stocks that look like absolute bargains right now are Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOG) (NASDAQ: GOOGL), Taiwan Semiconductor (NYSE: TSM), and Adobe (NASDAQ: ADBE).  While I'm not sure how the rest of 2025 (or beyond) will shake out for Alphabet, it holds a dominant position in the advertising space (which got it into trouble with the U.S. government) with its Google family of products,.
